worldedit.msg: WorldEdit has been known to increase the RAM usage of this modpack by a very large factor, especially on servers. However, Axiom paired with Connector have been reported to work well as alternatives.

essential.msg:
Essential has been known to cause many issues that're difficult for developers to solve, as well as irreversible world corruption. We recommend the following as alternatives for free multiplayer:
  • Cloudflared
  • Tunnely
  • e4mc
